summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1977, for the improvement of First Avenue Northeast, from East Fiftieth Street to East Fifty-second Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing concrete walks and crosswalks thereon, together with the necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 20382, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
